pullrequest.title: Remove created cameras in scene manager from camera's destructor

content.raw: I had to enclose every part where a camera is created using `OgreSceneManager::createCamera` in every test because it seems that `DestroyScene` along with `unloadEngine` cleans everything except the cameras. I saw in every test that the destructor of the `OgreCamera` was called when the stack was popping out every local variable \(the local shared\_ptr is holding the ownership\).
